statements: UPDATE reports SET clicks=100 WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE reports SET campaign_name='New Campaign' WHERE report_id=2;
UPDATE reports SET revenue=500.00 WHERE report_id=3;
UPDATE campaign_data SET ad_spend = ad_spend + 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_data SET conversions = 50 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE campaign_reports SET impressions = impressions + 500 WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE campaign_data SET ad_spend = ad_spend + 500.50 WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
UPDATE campaign_reports SET impressions = impressions * 1.1, clicks = clicks * 1.2 WHERE campaign_id = 1002;
UPDATE campaign_data SET conversions = conversions + 10, revenue = revenue + 1500.75 WHERE campaign_id = 1003;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET impressions = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = 500.00 WHERE purchase_id = 1;
UPDATE roi_reports SET roi = 0.25 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET impressions = impressions + 100, cost = cost + 50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = purchase_amount * 1.1, purchase_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE roi_reports SET roi = roi * 1.05, report_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name='New Campaign Name' WHERE campaign_id=1;
UPDATE Clicks SET ip_address='192.168.1.100' WHERE click_id=1;
UPDATE Conversions SET revenue=50.00 WHERE conversion_id=1;
UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Campaign Name' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Clicks SET ip_address = '10.0.0.1' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Conversions SET revenue = 1500.00 WHERE conversion_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET clicks = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_roi SET cost = 500.50, roi = 2.5 WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE campaign_performance SET clicks = 150, impressions = 2000, conversions = 50 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET clicks = clicks + 10, impressions = impressions + 5 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE campaign_roi SET revenue = revenue * 1.05, roi = (revenue - cost) / cost WHERE campaign_id = 102
UPDATE campaign_performance SET clicks = clicks * 1.2, impressions = impressions * 1.1, revenue = revenue * 1.15 WHERE campaign_id = 103
